channel.title: Fix Agressive Npc Multicombat [Delta]

item.title: Fix Agressive Npc Multicombat [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Ever notice how when you get near a lot of aggressive npc’s on delta’s base, they all seem to ignore the fact that its non-multi and attack all at once? This should fix most of it, please note that on rare occasions 2 of them may be able to get on you at once, if someone finds a way to fix this please tell me.

Ok, this is a pretty short and easy fix so lets get rolling…

First, Open up your NPCHandler…

Find (using ctrl +f if necessary)

public void annoyNpcs(int npcId) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client player = (client)p;


Now right under

client player = (client)p


Add this…

if ((player.inCombat) && !player.multiCombat()){ return; }

Basically what this says is, if the player the npc is trying to attack is already in combat, then it won’t attack. Hopefully you understood that.

Thanks for reading my tutorial, I hope it helped you out!
